attributes.action: Stop BBC weather reporters from using the phrase 'a touch of frost'.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I wish to peteition the Prime Minister to stop BBC weather reporters from using the phrase 'a touch of frost' as I believe it is an 'in joke' which they are wasting tax payers money perpetuating.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
